import React from'react';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{ErrorMessage,Formik,Form,Field}from'formik';import*as yup from'yup';import axios from'axios';import{history}from'../../history';import'./Login.css';var Login=function Login(){var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(values){axios.post('http://localhost:8080/v1/api/auth',values).then(function(resp){var data=resp.data;if(data){localStorage.setItem('app-token',data);history.push('/app');}});// console.log(values)
};var validations=yup.object().shape({email:yup.string().email().required(),password:yup.string().min(8).required()});return React.createElement("div",{id:"sign-up",className:"small-container"},React.createElement("h3",null,"Login"),React.createElement("div",{className:"box-group"},React.createElement(Formik,{initialValues:{},onSubmit:handleSubmit,validationSchema:validations},React.createElement(Form,{className:"Login"},React.createElement("div",{className:"Login-Group"},React.createElement(Field,{name:"email",className:"Login-Field",placeholder:"Email"}),React.createElement(ErrorMessage,{component:"span",name:"email",className:"Login-Error"})),React.createElement("div",{className:"Login-Group"},React.createElement(Field,{name:"password",className:"Login-Field",placeholder:"Senha"}),React.createElement(ErrorMessage,{component:"span",name:"password",className:"Login-Error"})),React.createElement("button",{className:"Login-Btn",type:"submit"},"Login"))),React.createElement("div",{id:"btn-login"},React.createElement(Link,{to:"/register"},"Criar conta"))));};export default Login;
